name: Mask On! (gdim)
description:
«Mask On» is an action-adventure
platformer. The game follows a
resident of a distant future on a
journey through a city succumbing to
an cataclysmic event of a generation
long pandemic. He moves from the
outskirts to the center, collecting items
necessary for survival and facing the
the consequences of the disease in a
huge metropolis.

Story
A far and distant future. The hollow shell of what was once a
thriving city. The air is full of poisonous gases, and the atmosphere
is much hotter than before. Some scavenging rogues took the
remains of the richest districts under control and appropriated
most of life-necessary resources.The character lives in the slums
located on the outskirts. She is trying to help her people to survive
and risks her own life to get scarce goods in other districts. The
evil stands in her way, the city becomes even more dangerous
as night falls. Meanwhile an invisible threat creeps back onto the
streets. But she is brave and strong. Let’s hit the road!
